https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tIax7BxBG5ygPchcnkdQtdr8d9l.jpg In 1988, the Wyrick family moves into a new home, which was mysteriously abandoned by the previous owners. Shortly afterward, their four-year-old daughter Heidi begins spending time with an imaginary friend, a kindly old man named Mr. Gordy. Several months later, Heidi is frightened by the appearance of a man at the front door. A Haunting in Georgia
